content.prompt: The height h, in meters, of an object at time t is given by h(t) = 24t + 24t3/2 - 16t2. What is the height of the object at the instant when it reaches its maximum upward velocity?

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
